name: Steleway
description:
"Ground rules"

This is your last mission before to become an Explorator. To accomplish it, you will explore the ancient stele dungeon and get over it. But be carefully, many puzzle and monsters could be block to you in the success of your objectif.

Controls:

  • Arrow to move
  • X to interact with many things
  • C to throw knife (If enable)

This game is created for the GithubGameOff 2022

The Github repository here =>  https://github.com/RemySd/GitHubGameOff2022

Music by Carlos Rios (https://www.instagram.com/pixels2music/)
